Blog.post: 22 AUGUST 2004 eLoO...today wake up early..!!so sleepy...we have a 'trip' to NYP...Nanyang Poly..FARRHAN's(my cousin) old poly...now he's in SP if he's still in there can meet him...that poly was also Wardah's poly if i'm not wrong...but never see her...it was the smallestpoly in s'pore..haha...but for me so big already siotz...the macdonald!bleh jadi giler..the price so reasonable...murah siotz...agaknye kalau i'm in there tiap² hari siotz makan mac...haha...then we take a tour around...i,aZ and sHa choose the same course It&media design..ok ar...fun...after that we went to Vista Point lepakz²... aZ beli rokok..then we smoke daerah her blk ar...then Dayat also got..he met Nina...only LySaand sHa not there...Dayat very funny siotz...haha...then after lepakz² around 3 we went home..then i receive a SmS from Dyk..she asked me if i was free..then i say why ar..then she sayshe got extra tix...3 tix for RuFfEdgE concert...ape lagi...me nk gi ar..then i ask FaD to come along...since she LIKE so much ZAIN..haha..but she dun have any idea wat to say t RauF..haiz..RauF..RauF...tak abez²...then ingat nk ajak aZ..but just now she said she went to her grandma's house..so i called up iQin and asked her to come along..then ok ar... when i reached there...1 gerl wearin d VoN dUtcH stuff come up to me..i was like who is she siotz..then it was LiNa..haha...different siotz she..then she asked me to sit wif her..then i go ar..theng uess who did i saw..??waTi ar...siotz ar...terkejut siotz...i 4get that she,lina and dyk were frens..then we act normal ar...all the way i talked to iqin...sumtymes to lina or dyk..then when it was tyme to go in...we rushed ar to sit infront..but too bad..no place..then when the show starts,i was shouting like crazy..Zan.!!!!sOooO hEncEM..!!argh...cair siotz..!!!!their song not bad ar...then zan was always looking at our area...then he smile...CuTe!!!!!!!faD...!aku dpt jumpe...haha...ok lah rUfFeDgE...like tiz i want to buy their cD ar..haha...klah dunno watto say...ciao..!!

eLoO…me just came back….jus now go to Queensway take a look around…the things there cheap siotz…next tyme when I have the money I wanna go there ar…then after that we went to esplanade despite the rainy weather …actually today I lazy to go out as 1st thing its raining then sumore I dun have money like lazy siotz to go out…haiz…but just go on with it ar…then at Queensway they say they saw the Haikal anak metropolitan…arghh…I don’t noticed him…everytyme siotz…always my fren were the one who saw him but I didn’t get the chance to see him…takde jodoh ar..haha.. :P actually before going to esplanade we went to town…aZ rich siotz…she buy rOxY cap and a wallet for Tung Siang…rich siotz she…we all very jealous…!! then in esplanade I call LaN…haha…just for fun…then we talk quite long ar…many stuff…luckily got topic…so cute siotz him…then he say to me he want to ask me sumting then I say wat ar..he say”Lyn smoke eh” I was like..”hMmm….ar ar…asal?LaN tk suke eh?”then he say nolah…he don’t care bout it…then I ask ar how he knew bout it…who told him then he say no one told him..he can see by my face that I smoke..haha…very paiseh already siotz…got so many things we talk about ar…actually wat happen to nEwbOyz…all those stuff…bout me…bout him…mizz him..!! niwae juz now went to school took bus with HIM again..haiz…mcm biasa jugak…I step tak nampak ar…today they got audition for Teacher’s Day…but they didn’t managed to get in..haha… =) tomorrow must wake up early…must go to Nanyang Poly…got some workshop there..haiz..Sunday also must wake up early got big walk..then in the afternoon got ThaNk yOu paRtY..what to wear ar…dun no ar…k ar…ciao 1st…!

19 AUGUST 2004 aLoO…today like very sleepy…juz now was ,my social studies paper…oklah can do it becoz of sumting…paham² ajer…then after school saw HIM ,when going to humanities room also saw HIM ..then there was an eye contact between HIM and me…but I always look away…once there is eye contact I will look away…dun wanna see HIM in the eye…feel like very awkward…haiz… HIS like so different since yesterday…my fren also said tat… its HIS appearance… HIS hair is different…so cute siotz…haiz…sumtymes I saw HIM I feel like crying coz I mizz HIM …still LUV HIM …dunno wats gonna happen lah… then after school went to music room to accompany Lysa practicing to Teacher’s Day…she sang with Fit and Mas…the song My Happy Ending..the touching song…jealous siotz see Fit can play the guitar..haha…her voice so the very merdu…then she can also play the piano…ini lah orang katekan anak seni…haha…then Mas voice was oklah…maybe infront of us she purposely sang it tat way…after tat we went home..Nina happy get a call from Dayat..!she met Dayat at marsiling mrt…aZ also happy get to talk with frozz....haha…funny lah them…haiz..me alone dun have anione…haiz…wateva…cant have anione…my heart still belongs to HIM…haiz…then after tat we smoke for a while then went back…at home I slept till 7 then woke up watch cite cine…then at 8 s’pore idiol..funny siotz..haha… niwae Mala told me tat LaN knew my real age already..!!argh...Mala say how he knew..he said tat I wrote my year in the kad tat I gave him..argh…bit he say he didn’t mind….he also knew I smoke ar…haiz…how cum eh…dun no ar….haha…mizz him siotz…today Mala gonna kol him..maybe I kol him tomorrow..niwae heres a pic of him…nEwbOyz….k ar ciao 1st..!! =LaN= =nEwbOyz=

18 AUGUST 2004 eLoO…today like no mood…I’ve just stop crying…haiz…like very stressed ar…I tink tat I mizz HIM alotz…gonna be 2month soon without HIM still I cant 4get HIM ..Looking back at the msg(s) that HE gave me…wat HE promised me…wat HE say to me…wont leave me no matter wat happens…ask me not to worry…but now..??!!wat??!!where is all the promises that HE have made..??where..??!!kate² manis..all gone…semua hanya sekadar permainan dan kate² manis yg tidak boleh dipercayai…haiz..all guys the same…but I thought HE is different from others but I was wrong…haiz..dun no wat to say of HIM … Sumtymes I feel stupid to still cry over HIM …but I cant control it…I still love HIM ..i dun no wat shall I do to 4get HIM …everyday saw HIM in school…how??!!how to 4get..??itz so difficult..i jus have to face it…haiz…dun no lah when I’m gonna 4get everything bout HIM …juz hope that no matter wat HE wont 4get me…LuV n mzz HIM aLoTz…I’ve post a pic of HIM … Just now go to school also HE took the same bus as me…then I step tk nampak..i always like tat…step tk nmpk…dun have the urge to face HIM ..feel very awkward…haiz…then can smell HIS perfume again…really miz HIM …k lah dun wanna talk bout HIM ar… feel very sad… :’( juz now in class was bored..i was so sleepy..haiz…niwae yesterday I sms zaCk and he reply ar..!! shocked siotz…thought he wont rply..i ask him many question but he just reply “THANKS….KIRIM SALAM KAT KAWAN2 SEMUA…” waste msg rite…sumore he from Malaysia..haha…suke hati die lah… aRgH…!!tomorrow social studies test…luckily must study a bit only…at night can study ar…juz now get my maths result..haha…worse siotz…!!haha…maths wat do u expect..??haha…my maths very the worse ar…k ar dun no wat else to say…ciao… .

17 AUGUST 2004 eLoOo...today was so boring....got tuition..so boring..!just now chemistry and physic paper..haiz..!!touching siotz...wat i study for chemistry yesterday didnt come out siotz..sortz jer...haiz...scared ar fail overall...then jus now went to school...take bus... HE took the same bus as me...as HE walked pass me...can smell siotz HIS perfume...very nice...mizz HIM sey...when am i going to forget HIM ??!!dunolah... after school go causeway point eat LonG jOhN sLvEr..then after that go home coz wanna go out to Bestway Building to take tickets to the rUfFeDgE concert but guess wat??the tickets is finished!!!sial ar...dah maki² siotz...2 times already..!!!argh...next tyme must come early ar...biasa ar...tickets free wat..who dun wan...all kiasu...kanchong...bingit giller sey...never mind lah...luckily rUfFeDgE not nEwbOyz....if nEwbOyz..haiz..!!!i tink i cry already siotz..i mean the oLd nEwbOyz..not the new one wif the new members...sowie aZ must teman me...after that we lepakz bwh blk...smoke...talk²...then after that i went to tuition...mendakz...!!luckily tomorrow no paper...on thursday then social studies..good ar can relax...k ar ciao 1st..!!

16 AUGUST 2004 I'm so damn happy today...!!!argh....cannot take it siotz...haha...why am i sooo happy..???!!!Because i call LaN haha...we talk quite long ar...mizz him man...haiz...he gonna have a operation on his throat on 1st september...and it must be cut off...=( so sad siotz...he say must cut it off if not it will spread...better cut it off or it will be worse..!wish him gud luck..then he say oklah sayang..haha...many things we talk about...he say he cannot wait to meet me in December...he also kept asking bout my boyfren siotz...he dun believe that i dun have a boyfren...then i say ar break already...then he ask why lah...wats he's age..wat happen..who ask for the break..then i told him everything that have happen ar...then he ask me to find a guy that is much older...maybe he mean more matured guys so that can handle tiz type of matter...he also say that he's not confirm if he's gonna come down here in s'pore...then tiz part ar...touching siotz...he say why i never call him...then he say "yelah orang tu maner ingatkan Lan pat sini kan"haha..i was liked eh...dun say like that ar...then i say ar i scared to call him...he say no need to scared...Lan tak makan org... :P hehe...klakar ar him...got many more things ar to say...cannot tell all in here ar... :P Haha...i wont get him lah...itz SOO imposible..just treat him as my brother..!!haiz...in my heart there is still HIM ....cant 4get HIM yet...cant accept anione else...still HIS name in my heart...haiz...when am i going to forget HIM siotz...haiz...niwae juz now go study wif aZ,fRoZz and aLiP...but i and aZ only the one studying...the 2 of them talk² only..stress siotz...chemistry...haiz..!!only understand a bit....then physic dun understand aniting...i only know clinical thermometer...laboratory thermometer...sumore hmm...dun no lah...haiz...i scared i fail siotz...juz now maths..haiz!!!!i study variations then juz now i found out variations dun come out for test..only 1 ques...siotz ar waste my time...after school go KFC eat...then go lemon tee buy for sis present...then go home and changed to go study...k lah ciao 1st...!!

15 August 2004 today so damn bored...never go out...argh...!!tomorow common test...maths sumore still can relax siotz me..!!haiz...lazy siotz to study...jus now fad come...do research on f&n...f&n project dateline is tomorow...and i dun no wat to research on...haiz..wats gonna happen to me..!! yesterday night went to west coast wif my family & couz...jalan²...mendakz..!aZ kol me wanted to tell me that HE's online...but too bad i'm not at home..!!:-( cannot chat wif him...nevermind lah...today hp hOp fEasT..all my fwens going but i'm not going..haiz...never mind lah..i also lazy to go...juz now mala kol me...we talk bout LaN she told me tat LaN was waiting for my kol..haha...like cannot believe lah..got many things lah she say...haha...mizz LaN alotz sia...k lah ciao 1st...dun no wat to say..!!

14 AUGUST 2004 aLoO...sO boring today...i never go out..my mum went to johor never ajak me...but i kirim her NeWbOyz new cd...!!yeah...and i'm listening to it now...the cover album very nice..ToMoK vocal have change a lot...and the song not so jiwang animore..haiz...but i feel like crying when listening to it..haiz...see the cover album also feel like crying..coz if not there are five members..tOmOk,LaN ,zaCk,jaY and aLonG..but now left 4..2 new members...2 old members..haiz...:'(so sad siotz...!I mizz them alotz...but the new song not bad ar.... aRgH..!!tomorow hIp hOp fEasT...i cannot go wif my fwens!!there's a gathering at my house coz my sista bdae..haiz..never mind lah..i also dun no wat to wear...i want to study..but so lazy..haha..monday already common test siotz..!maths and eng..haiz...how am i going to study..juz now watch nDp..haha..the leaves so cute...the ORcHiD so pReTtY..hehe..thats me lah..!haha...nice ar... eh...why NeWbOyz's song so rancak sey...why dun have the jiwang²..nevermind its only the 3rd song..i havent hear the whole cd..hope there's a jiwang song...bleh jugak berjiwang sikit..haha...k ar...dun no wat else to say...ciao!!

13 August 2004 aLoo..!haiz...so tired..me just came back from town...1st we went to Bestway Building..take train...then got one hensem boi siotz..so hencem..haha...but waste tyme siotz go there(Bestway Building)the people there say can only take on monday as the concert was on 21 aug...waste our tyme onli..!then after that we wanna proceed to tOwn to eat...but we lost our way ar...luckily got 700...straight go to causeway...then we eat KFC...after that go espLanade...lepakz²....smoke...talk² kontol...haha...then there was a group of guy ask us to sit wif them...all sachok²...haha...but one of them was quite ok ar..haha...niwae now my cousins are here...FARRHAN is here..hehe...the hensem boy...aZ jgn jealous..! niwae yesterday night i get to chat wif HIM ..!!haha...tak disangkekan..!! HE pm me 1st...my nick in mSn was about HIM ..then HE pm me asking "saper jer ur syg tau"haha..then got then wink smiley face..haha...i'm sure HE knew its HIM ...obviously!then we chat...all kontol²..mepekz²..haha....funny siotz HIM ...argh...i mizz HIM aLotz..!!while i was chatting wif HIM ...touching siotz tiz part...thE rEasOn ar on perfect10...siotz ar... HE dedicated tiz song for me...haiz...then got eVerYtmE...haiz..!!then suddenly i cry...haiz...juz cant 4get him... HE told me HE went to esplanade on National Day to watch fireworks ar...but i didnt ask wif who..then suddenly in school i question myself that...haiz...so worry siotz even though he's not mine animore..!kept tinking bout it until in espLanade while aZ was talking to FroZz i ask aZ to ask FroZz who HE went wif..then FroZz say DipTa..haiz..lege siotz hati..haha...really cant 4get him ar...haiz...k ar ciao ar...!

12 aUgUsT 2004 1st time blogging in...hmm...12 august..today was my sisTa bdaE..!she's already 22..dah besar anak mak..haiz...havent buy for her present..dun no wat to buy..in class was so damn bored...luckily 1st 2 periods Mr Reduan never come..so there was free period..then after that got social studies..haiz..mendakz!!then recess...today was the 'o' level motHeR toNgUe result..then in canteen aZn asK HIM wats he's result..then he said he failed it..haha...lawak...but actually he got B4 for HIS malay...dun no wat he's feeling getting to noe he's result..hope he do well in his 'o' level..!mzZ HIM sotz...haiz..after school got detention..!luckily got fren..i force Nina to come along..haha..sowie Nina.. =) it was actually a 2 hour detention but luckily Mrs Long didnt knew it..haha...then after that mit aZ,faD and sHa...we lepakz...smoke...nina's one..tHaNkz..!haha...then reach home about 5 plus...so sleepy...fall asleep then woke up to kizz iFfaH coz she's going back..she will be here again on monday...that cutey baby...hehe...k lah blog out first...ciao!!
